description: This over-the-calf sock will put you over the moon after your next day on the slopes, because it’s got you covered for comfort. With breathable, durable construction and a dialed-in performance fit, this men’s wool snowboarding sock will make you feel like you’re gliding through the cosmos. And with its unique snowboarder-in-space design, your one-of-a-kind style will be the star of the day—and night.
name: Smartwool Performance Snow Targeted Cushion Astronaut Over The Calf Socks - Mens
